slides.title: The Solar System
slides.narration: Welcome to this presentation on the Solar System. We will explore the planets and other celestial bodies that orbit our Sun.
slides.image_prompt: A realistic and detailed illustration of the entire Solar System, showing the Sun and all the planets in their orbits against a starry background.

slides.title: The Sun
content: Star at the center of the Solar System
Composed mostly of hydrogen and helium
slides.narration: The Sun is the star at the center of our Solar System. It is a nearly perfect sphere of hot plasma, heated to incandescence by nuclear fusion reactions in its core.
slides.image_prompt: A close-up, high-resolution image of the Sun, showing its fiery surface, solar flares, and intense brightness.
